Company Name: Tihama Advertising and Public Relations Co (4070)
Description: Tihama Advertising and Public Relations Co (known as: TAPRCO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. TAPRCO operates within the Media sector focusing on Advertising. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, UAE, United Kingdom and Bahrain. TAPRCO is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in April 1983.
